channel.title: Building Community with Nourishing Platonic Touch, Snuggle, & Cuddle Events
channel.description: Building Community with Nourishing Platonic Touch, Snuggle, & Cuddle Events

item.title: About The Snuggle Party Guidebook
item.description:
About The Snuggle Party Guidebook

Imagine a life where physical affection is readily available beyond romantic relationships. A life where you resonate with friends on a deeper heartfelt level.

item.title:
“Dave Wheitner’sThe Snuggle Party Guidebook
is far more than an excellent and thorough guidebook. It is an inspirational work that opens delightful pathways to intimacy with oneself and others. I loved how it offers healing from limiting stereotypical gender roles, and the accompanying photos always brought a smile to my face. Don’t miss this book!”
item.description:
“Dave Wheitner’sThe Snuggle Party Guidebook is far more than an excellent and thorough guidebook. It is an inspirational work that opens delightful pathways to intimacy with oneself and others. I loved how it offers healing from limiting stereotypical gender roles, and the accompanying photos always brought a smile to my face. Don’t miss this book!” 

 – Karla Baur, M.S.W., sex therapist and co-author of Our Sexuality, the best-selling college textbook

item.title: Get Your Snuggle On!
item.description:
